recipe.cookingInstructions: In a pot, combine chicken/pork, soy sauce, and vinegar. Let it marinate for 30 minutes. Then, simmer the mixture over medium heat. Do not stir until it boils. Lastly, lower the heat and let it cook until the meat is tender and the sauce thickens.

ingredients.ingredient: 1 packet tamarind soup mix (or fresh tamarind)

recipe.cookingInstructions: Boil pork ribs in water until tender. Remove scum from the surface. Then, add tamarind mix and let it simmer for 5-10 minutes. Lastly, adjust the seasoning, then serve hot.
Sauté vegetables in a pan with a little oil. Then, add soy sauce and noodles, then stir-fry until well combined. Lastly, cook for a few minutes until the noodles are tender.
Sauté ginger in a pot, then add chicken and cook until slightly browned. Then, pour in water and bring to a boil. Lastly, simmer until chicken is tender, then serve hot..
Roll banana slices in brown sugar. Wrap them in lumpia wrappers.Then, fry in hot oil until golden brown. Lastly, drain excess oil and serve.
